name: Trespasser Limited Edition CDr EP
description:
The new EP from Guilty Ghosts features 20 minutes of new music. Each CDr comes encased in a custom die cut sleeve manufactured by ACD Sleeve, and is of an limited edition pressing of 100. Each package includes release notes and is numbered on the inner sleeve of the album artwork.

(Prices includes shipping)

name: VEILS - Deluxe Cassette Bundle
description:
This is the first Guilty Ghosts full-length release. It is a limited edition deluxe cassette tape bundle through WORDS+DREAMS. Each pro-dubbed 60-minute tape comes with an mp3 download of the album, plus a bonus track, a free bonus mix CD with songs that inspired the album, and label and artist stickers, all stuffed in a hand-screened cotton satchel to hold it all together.

A1 The End of Akira 
A2 Everlasting Evening (feat. Sea Oleena) 
A3 Late Night Voyages 
A4 The People You Love 
A5 In Our Book
A6 Tinted Windows (feat. Guerre) 

B1 Begotten 
B2 Lowe 
B3 Great Malevolent Withholder 
B4 Top Prize Fighter 
B5 Stampede (bonus track)

$9 USD / $12 WORLD
Incl. Shipping

name: Guilty Ghosts/asentimentalsong - Ltd Edition Split 10" (of 100)
description:
Split 10" with drone/ambient composer Joe Morgan aka asentimentalsong on the A Side, and on the B Side, 3 new original guitar compositions from Guilty Ghosts recorded during the early sessions for VEILS. 

Limited run of 100 marbled burgundy vinyl, double-sided inserts with designs by both artists, all cased in white glossy screen-printed cases. 

Includes free digital download.

A Harding Street Assembly Lab release (HSAL19)

***First 10 orders get a free Guilty Ghosts sticker***

$15 USD / $25 WORLD
Incl. Shipping
